rewards.description:
Season of Support is live!

Celebrate the holidays by showing love to THE FINALS creators all season long.
Gift subs or subscribe during the event to unlock these rewards:

3 total gifted subs → Earn the Charmalure Pack with three weapon skins.
5 total gifted subs → Unlock the Bass Unit 86 helmet skin.

We've also extended the Calvin the Cube drop series all the way until January 8th!

Spread cheer, support your favorite creators, and gear up with new cosmetics during Season of Support!
rewards.name: Season of Support!

rewards.description: The final drops of the Observer set are out now. For this set of drops, we are including ALL of the items we’ve given away in Chapter 2 so far, plus the final pieces that complete the Observer building set. In addition, all of the items from Chapter 1 are now obtainable in-game, so if you missed out on any of our previous drops, you can make sure to pick them up via the vendor in Arrakeen or Harko Village.

rewards.description: 🎮 Announcing Kakele Online's Epic Twitch Drops!  Embark on a unique journey in Kakele's realm. Dive into mystical lands, conquer quests, and enjoy our exciting Twitch Drops for enhanced gaming. Unlock rewards, including teleports, herbs, potions, and materials.  🕒 Timed Rewards: Enjoy cities Teleports, Ultra potions, Gold Refiner Kits and collect Dog Cards and Trophies.  💰 Prosperity Path: Gain Copper, Tin, Silver, Iron, Gold, Life Herbs, Mana Herbs for success. Accumulate Reputation Coins.  🎈 Grand Finale: End with an exclusive Twitch Drop and Bacon Extravaganza surprise! Link accounts, watch streams, and claim rewards for an unforgettable RPG experience.  🌟 How to Join:  Link Accounts: Connect your account and Twitch in the game app. Watch Streams: Tune in during to your favorite Kakele streamer. Claim Rewards: Receive Twitch Drop notifications claim in the game app.  Influencers: To enable drops on your stream, email us!  Don't miss the chance to enrich your journey with Twitch Drops!
rewards.name: Kakele Online- January
